name: The Way You Make Me Feel
wikiSummary: "The Way You Make Me Feel" is from Michael Jackson's 1987 album 'Bad'. It was released as the album's third single and became another number-one hit from the album on the U.S. Billboard Hot 100. The music video features Michael trying to pursue actress Tatiana Thumbtzen. Jackson's sister La Toya Jackson also appears in the video.
